text: The 2018 wildfire season in Nevada began in June 2018 and ended November 2018. Wildfires included: *Martin Fire (July 4–August 2), the largest in state history with burnedMartin Fire fully contained; rewards total $28,000 KOLO-TV August 2, 2018 *Boone Springs Fire (July 4–July 9) *South Sugarloaf Fire (August 17–September) *Upper Colony Fire (June 17–June 22) ==References== Wildfires Category:Wildfires in Nevada
title: 2018 Nevada wildfires
